title: Switching to block processing without finishing state sync (possible root cause of TrieExceptions)

labels.name: difficult
labels.description: It requires detailed knowledge of the codebase and changes can easily lead to severe issues. a

body:
[export-8da8f614f2f127e.csv](https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/files/9491397/export-8da8f614f2f127e.csv)


We started processing before we finished state sync:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9356351/188493983-c3c3d0a2-dad6-41da-8533-345eeae07b97.png)


So we send request with:
DownloaderOptions.Process https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/blob/master/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Merge.Plugin/Synchronization/MergeBlockDownloader.cs#L102
Post-merge (but it could happen on pre-merge too)
Network: sepolia
CL client: teku
More logs: https://seq.nethermind.io/#/events?from=2022-09-01T16:16:37.963Z&to=2022-09-01T16:25:00.000Z&filter=NodeName%20%3D'Core-Merge-Comb-sepolia-teku'
Commit: https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/commits/master

We should add more useful logs for similar cases. What is more, we should consider stopping node.

Stack Trace:

>  Processing loop threw an exception. Block: Nethermind.Consensus.Processing.BlockRef, Exception: System.InvalidOperationException: Code 0x1998540da90cad36df102cdb35b44a1e4c831a6e31f4a774bcbd29e9ace16cec is missing from the database. at Nethermind.State.StateProvider.GetCode(Keccak codeHash) in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.State/StateProvider.cs:line 316 at Nethermind.Evm.VirtualMachine.GetCachedCodeInfo(IWorldState worldState, Address codeSource, IReleaseSpec vmSpec) in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Evm/VirtualMachine.cs:line 402 at Nethermind.Evm.TransactionProcessing.TransactionProcessor.Execute(Transaction transaction, BlockHeader block, ITxTracer txTracer, ExecutionOptions executionOptions) in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Evm/TransactionProcessing/TransactionProcessor.cs:line 331 at Nethermind.Evm.TransactionProcessing.TransactionProcessor.Execute(Transaction transaction, BlockHeader block, ITxTracer txTracer) in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Evm/TransactionProcessing/TransactionProcessor.cs:line 111 at Nethermind.Evm.TransactionProcessing.ExecuteTransactionProcessorAdapter.Execute(Transaction transaction, BlockHeader block, ITxTracer txTracer) in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Evm/TransactionProcessing/ExecuteTransactionProcessorAdapter.cs:line 33 at Nethermind.Consensus.Processing.TransactionProcessorAdapterExtensions.ProcessTransaction(ITransactionProcessorAdapter transactionProcessor, Block block, Transaction currentTx, BlockReceiptsTracer receiptsTracer, ProcessingOptions processingOptions, IStateProvider stateProvider) in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Consensus/Processing/TransactionProcessorAdapterExtensions.cs:line 40 at Nethermind.Consensus.Processing.BlockProcessor.BlockValidationTransactionsExecutor.ProcessTransactions(Block block, ProcessingOptions processingOptions, BlockReceiptsTracer receiptsTracer, IReleaseSpec spec) in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Consensus/Processing/BlockProcessor.BlockValidationTransactionsExecutor.cs:line 53 at Nethermind.Consensus.Processing.BlockProcessor.ProcessBlock(Block block, IBlockTracer blockTracer, ProcessingOptions options) in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Consensus/Processing/BlockProcessor.cs:line 238 at Nethermind.Consensus.Processing.BlockProcessor.ProcessOne(Block suggestedBlock, ProcessingOptions options, IBlockTracer blockTracer) in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Consensus/Processing/BlockProcessor.cs:line 207 at Nethermind.Consensus.Processing.BlockProcessor.Process(Keccak newBranchStateRoot, List`1 suggestedBlocks, ProcessingOptions options, IBlockTracer blockTracer) in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Consensus/Processing/BlockProcessor.cs:line 115 at Nethermind.Consensus.Processing.BlockchainProcessor.ProcessBranch(ProcessingBranch processingBranch, ProcessingOptions options, IBlockTracer tracer) in
